thread.title: Sylwia
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Sylwia

author: Sylwia
title: Sylwia
text: This was my first experience in purchasing new tires so I was a bit of a fish out of water. But, Dan was very helpful, informative and professional. Service was fast and efficient. I would highly recommend Town Fair Tire to anyone looking for fast, affordable and professional tire service!
